read and write brain images

read and write 3D or 4D NIFTI neuroimaging files into R

read_vol()

Load an image volume from a file

write_vol()

Generic function to write a 3D image volume to disk

read_vec()

read_vec

write_vec()

Generic function to write a 4D image vector to disk

read_header()

read header information of an image file

get information about data structures

Functions to access information about the shape, size, and structure of images

space()

Generic function to extract geometric properties of an image.

ndim()

Generic function to extract the number of dimensions of an object

spacing()

Generic function to extract the voxel dimensions of an image

which_dim()

which_dim

dim_of()

dim_of

axes()

Generic getter function to extract image axes

bounds()

Generic function to extract the spatial bounds (origin + dim * spacing) of an image param x the object

origin()

Generic getter to extract image origin

trans()

Generic getter to extract image coordinate transformation

voxels()

extract voxel coordinates

centroid() centroids()

return the centroid of an object

querying, dividing, slicing, and extracting data from image data structures

Functions to extract portions of data or split up data into sub-regions for further processing

vols()

Generic function to extract an ordered series of 3D volumes

vectors()

Generic function to extract an ordered series of 1D vectors

split_clusters()

Generic function to cut an object into a list of spatial or spatiotemporal clusters

split_blocks()

Generic function to cut a vector-valued object into a list of sub-blocks

patch_set()

Extract set of patches

slices()

Generic function to extract an ordered series of 2D slices

series_roi() series()

Extract one or more series from object and return as ROI object

partition()

Generic function to partition an image into a set of disjoint clusters

sub_vector()

Generic function to extract a sub-vector from a NeuroVec object.

searchlight functions

Functions to support “searchlight” analyses of image data

bootstrap_searchlight() searchlight_coords() searchlight() clustered_searchlight()

bootstrap_searchlight

random_searchlight()

random_searchlight
